text: Tomara'i bate! Tomara ai odera bhalobasa, athaca tara tomadera bhalobase na, tomara kintu dharmagranthe bisbasa karo, tara sabatate. Ara yakhana tara tomadera sathe dekha kare tara bale -- ''amara imana enechi’’; ara yakhana tara niribili haya, tomadera prati akrose tara angula kamaraya. Tumi balo -- ''tomadera akrose mare ya'o. Nihsandeha bukera madhye ki ache se-sanbandhe allah sarbajnata.
